item.title: A Vixen Named Clarity
item.description: She is one of those words in bold print on the pages of your life story. Clarity. It means having the quality of being certain or definite. Clear. Her only purpose, as it relates to how we process the world around us, is to convey that this – whatever this is – is important. Routine becomes vague; the path familiar; the pace: machine-like and automatic; the challenges many; the needs plenty.
